response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you. I am offering it to you for $14,000, which I believe is a fair and reasonable price considering its value to both of us. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations and budget. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 14000}
